attributes.action: create a new law ordering all individuals to slap their women at least once a day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a proud wife beater, I would like this law to be effective immediately so I can whack my wife without worrying.

I am sure a lot of males support this cause.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
